comment: For each of the below five properties, a random distribution to draw the property from can be configured.
The type can be set as constant (just a constant value VAL), uniform (draw uniformly at random from an interval),
normal (simplified normal distribution where values are capped at provided interval borders), or
exponential (exponential distribution with lambda provided). The params describe the respective distribution.

maxdemand.comment: The maximum demand (= number of processes) a job desires. (0 = unlimited)

wallclock-limit.comment: The wallclock time which may be spent computing until a job is cancelled. (0 = unlimited)

arrival.comment: The arrival of a job given in seconds after Mallob's upstart.

burstsize.comment: The number of jobs arriving simultaneously at each arrival event.
